II fldgi – wêlrK

iïu; jQ mk;a ... ... ... ... —

fY%aIaGdêlrKfha wmrdO kvq ieis ms<sn| ksfõok ... —
Èid wêlrK yd ufyia;%d;a wêlrK ±kaùï ... 2492
^fjk fjku f.dkq lr .; yels mßÈ iEu fldgilg u wh;a tla tla  NdIdjlg fjk fjk msgq wxl fhdod we;'&
2491 - B 80784— 500 (2013/11)

i;sm;d ksl=;a jk .eiÜ m;%fhys m<lsÍu  i|yd Ndr.kq ,nk ±kaùï ms<sn|
jeo.;a ksfõokhhs
Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%fha wjika msgqfõ iEu udihl u uq,a i;sfha § m< lrk ksfõok Ndr.kakd
Èkhka iy fõ,djka ms<sn|j ñka wjOdkh fhduq lrkq ,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m< lsÍu i|yd oekaùï Ndr.ekSu .eiÜ m;%h m<lrkq ,nk Èkhg i;s follg fmr isl=rdod Èkfhys oyj,a 12'00
g wjika lrkq ,efí' ;k;=re - wenE¾;=" úNd." fgkav¾ iy fjkafoais ms<sn| oekaùïj, wjika Èk iy fõ,djka ta ms<sn|j Wkkaÿjla
olajk whg m%udKj;a ld, fõ,djla ,efnk mßÈ fhdod.; hq;= njg" ish¨ u fomd¾;fïka;=" ixia:d iy uKav, hkdÈh j.n,d.; hq;= nj
ñka wjOdrKh flf¾' m<lsÍu i|yd tjkq ,nk iEu oekaùula u ;ks me;af;a muKla meyeÈ,sj msgm;a l< hq;= h' ksrjoH;djh ms<sn|j
lrk úuiSï iy meñKs,s 
.eiÜ m;%h m< jQ Èk isg f;uilg miqj Ndr.kq fkd,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m< lrk iEu oekaùula u .eiÜ m;%h m< lrkq ,nk Èkg i;s follg fmr tkï" 2013 foieïn¾ ui 06 jeks Èk
m< lrk .eiÜ m;%fha oekaùï 2013 fkdjeïn¾ ui 22 jeks Èk oyj,a 12'00g fyda Bg fmr ;emEf,ka fyda f.kú;a rcfha uqøKd,hg NdrÈh
hq;= h'
 2006 wxl 19 ork bf,lafg%dksl .kqfokq mk; - 9 jeks j.ka;sh
zzhï m%ldYkhla" Í;shla" ksfhda.hla" kshuhla" w;=re jHjia:djla" ksfõokhla fyda fjk;a lsisjla .eiÜ m;%fha m< l< hq;= njg hï
mk;lska fyda kS;s m%{ma;shlska úêúOdk i,iajd we;s wjia:djl" ta Í;sh" ksfhda.h" kshuh" w;=re jHjia:dj" ksfõokh fyda fjk;a foh
bf,lafg%dksl iajrEmfha jk .eiÜ m;%hl m< lrkq ,enqjfyd;a ta úêúOdkh iïmQ¾K lr we;a;dla fia ie,lsh hq;=h'˜
mS' tÉ' t,a' ù' o is,ajd"
rcfha uqøKd,hdêm;s ^je' n'&
2013 ckjdß ui 01 jeks Èk"
fld<U 08"
rcfha uqøK fomd¾;fïka;=fõ § h'
ie' hq'- 2013'11'08 osk m< jQ wxl 1"836 ork .eiÜ m;%fha I : III fldgi m< fkdùh'

II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2013'11'152492
Èid wêlrK yd ufyia;%d;a wêlrK oekaùï
ufyia;%d;a wêlrKh - nKavdrfj,
jir mylg ^05& jvd merKs kvq jd¾;d úkdY lsÍu
fuu wêlrKfha wjika ù we;s jir mylg ^05& jvd merKs kvq jd¾;d úkdY lsÍu i|yd f,aLk.; lr we;' ta iïnkaOfhka jQ kvq
wxlhka my;ska olajd we;' fuu kvq iïnkaOfhka hï ú;a;slrefjl=g fyda md¾Yjlrefjl=g kS;slD;H ,nd .ekSug wjYH;djhla
we;akï 2014'02'24 jeks Èkg fmr fuu wêlrK ld¾hd,hg meñK ,nd .kakd f,i fuhska ksfõokh lrkq ,efí'
2014'02'25 Èfkka miqj tlS kvq jd¾;d úkdY lrkq ,nk nj fuhska okajd isáñ'
ví,sõ' wd¾' tï' ta' úl%uisxy"
ufyia;%d;a"
ufyia;%d;a wêlrKh"
nKavdrfj,'
2013 Tlaf;dan¾ ui 30 jeks Èk"

ufyia;%d;a wêlrKh - kqjrt<sh
kqjrt<sh ufyia;%d;a wêlrKfha jir 05lg jvd merKs kvq jd¾;d úkdY lsÍug iQodkï fldg we;s w;r" tu kvq wxl my;ska olajd
we;'
02' kvqj,g wod< hï md¾Yjlrefjl=g ;udg wjYH kvqfõ fyda kvqj, iïmQ¾K msgm;la fyda hï fldgila fyda kvqj,g
f.dkq lr we;s hï ,shú,a,la fyda wem uqo,la ,nd .ekSug wjYH kï" ta i|yd b,A,Sula 2014'02'17 Èkg fmr fuu wêlrKfha
frðiag%d¾jrhd fj; bÈßm;a l< hq;= h'
tfia b,a,Sula fkdjqjfyd;a my; i|yka ish¨u kvq jd¾;d 2014'02'17 jeks Èfkka miqj wêlrK N+ñfha § úkdY lrkq ,nk nj
fuhska oekqï fokq ,efí'
ufyia;%d;a - kqjrt<sh'
2013 Tlaf;dan¾ ui 29 jeks Èk"
